game.name: GraviChess
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Use the classic chess pieces to work your way through this complex puzzle platformer. Capture all enemy pieces before they get you to beat the 102 intricately designed levels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use the classic chess pieces to work your way through this complex puzzle platformer. Capture all enemy pieces before they get you to beat the 102 intricately designed levels.

reviewHighlights.text: I enjoyed the level difficulty, you really have to think. The customization options were great too!!!
